journey: I discovered my passion for data science during my undergraduate studies, where I was fascinated by how data could tell compelling stories and drive meaningful decisions. This curiosity led me to dive deep into statistics, programming, and machine learning.

Throughout my academic journey, I've worked on various projects ranging from predictive modeling to data visualization, always with the goal of extracting actionable insights from complex datasets. I believe that the best data science happens at the intersection of technical skills and domain expertise.

When I'm not analyzing data or building models, you can find me exploring new datasets, reading about the latest developments in AI, or contributing to open-source projects. I'm always eager to learn and apply new techniques to solve real-world problems.

highlights.title: Problem Solver
highlights.description: Passionate about using data to solve complex business problems and improve decision-making processes.

highlights.title: Fast Learner
highlights.description: Quick to adapt to new technologies and methodologies in the rapidly evolving field of data science.

highlights.title: Team Player
highlights.description: Excellent communication skills and experience working in collaborative environments.

highlights.title: Results-Drive
highlights.description: Focused on delivering measurable outcomes and creating value through data-driven insights.
